page.title: 19HISTORIC CARLISLE TODAY
page.content: This block contains many of the features which attract tourists.Car- lisle Museum displays some prehistoric remains,and far more from Roman times. In its grounds are the main street and a shrine of Roman Carlisle.Recent digs have revealed more of the extensive Roman city.Hadrian's Wall crossed the block,but is no longer visible. The main historic features are medieval.The castle,where Mary Stuart was once held,is complete,and the cathedral is kept in good condition.A large section of the city wall is standing. Carlisle has more recent links with Bonnie Prince Charlie;he captured it in 1745.Much has been rebuilt since then.There are some attractive Georgian streets near the cathedral.The crowded housing around the castle was removed in the 1960s.
